content.rendered:
The Head of Department, The Department of Pharmaceutical Technology.

Courses offered : National Diploma in Pharmaceutical Technology and Higher National Diploma in Pharmaceutical Technology.

Admission Requirements For ND Pharmaceutical Technology

Duration: 2 years

5 Credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Biology and Chemistry at GCE ‘O’ Level , SSCE or Neco 

Admission Requirements for HND Pharmaceutical Technology

5 credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and Physics GCE ‘O’ Level , SSCE or Neco and evidence of ND completion in  Pharmaceutical Technology.
